item.title: Oktoberfest Chile 2014
item.description:
Oktoberfest Chile 2014 is an App to share contests and promotions , and it is being tested as part of Oktoberfest 2014 , the massive event that brings together prominent craft breweries in Malloco , Chile.

[[[[ ]]]]

How it works.

The app “Oktoberfest 2014 Chile” works by sending beats or notifications to mobile devices with a sound that alert the user when an opportunity is available so you can take it. For this, they have a web platform that manages in which you can define certain areas fences or action , where the customers or where activity occurs .

Not available anymore

item.title: LIBEAT
item.description:
Libeat, is your companion in the city while receiving opportunities and information in line with your interests. Discover new experiences in the indicated time and place where you are.

Promotional video

How it works.

Choose your interests to receive information and benefits. When you transites through an area where there are surprises , opportunities and activities. Visit the wall to see what the city has to offer.

Features

  • You choose the interests and brands on which you want to receive information. So , you get beats a personalized way.
  • You do not need to open the application for beats with the information that interests you. Download, choose your interests and let us do the rest !
  • You get beats with invitations , challenges, contests , discounts , and information at the time and accurate so that you can take advantage of location.
  • As we know how valuable your battery , we care to make efficient use of the resources of your mobile device.

Download

item.title: El Sapo (604)
item.description:
Introducing “El Sapo” for iPhone. Would you like to know how much longer will this mythical bus pass near to you? Then “El Sapo” is the mobile application for you. Download this app and you know the approximate time it will spend 604 bus whereabouts the closest to your position. Featuring an easy-to-use gesture-based navigation, Deep has been designed to help you quickly know the approximate time of the 604 bus. You can never go wrong with the real time information from, carefully notify from other users.

Share the last position of the 604 bus.

Share in real time the position of the 604 bus to other users.

[[[[ ]]]]

El Sapo was born in the 2013 TuApp Challenge.

It uses statistical analysis and machine learning techniques to predict when a given bus from line 604 will pass by a bus stop, since in Viña del Mar there is not a centralized data system on public transportation. The actual version was launched in Google’s Play Store first. We currently have near 1000 downloads and around 800 active users. A couple of weeks later, we released the iOS version, with 560 users to this day.

Download
